incoming_call.text: Thank you for calling Southern Smiles, this is [Name]. Who do I have the pleasure of speaking with?

patient_type.text: Thank you [Pt Name]. Are you a new or existing patient of the practice?

new_patient.text: Great! We always welcome new patients to our practice. Hey [Pt name], is the number you're calling from ending in XXXX, the best number to reach you, just in case the call drops?

existing_patient.text: Welcome back [Pt Name], how can I help you today?

record_np_log.text: Thank you for that [Pt Name]. How can I help you today?

patient_pushback.text: I'm sorry [Pt Name], Our phone system is over the internet, and sometimes it just drops, and we wanna be able to make sure we can reach you back.

apologize_move_on.text: I apologize for the inconvenience. Let's move on with how I can help you today.

insurance_question.text: That's a great question! We do have a lot of patients in our practice with various insurance plans. To better assist you, can I ask you how you found out about us?

insurance_followup.text: Thank you [Pt name]. To better answer your insurance questions, can you tell me more about what you're looking for? Just an exam and cleaning, an emergency, or is there something else?

routine_exam.text: I'm happy to hear you are interested in making sure your teeth and gums are healthy. Most insurance plans pay 100% of new patient exams and cleanings at our office. I can see you as soon as [earliest available appointment]. Would that work for you?

emergency.text: I'm sorry to hear that you are having this emergency. We need to get you in as soon as possible for Dr. Shkally to take a look. For us to do an exam and x-ray and tell you the best way to take care of that, it would be $37 out of pocket. We can see you as soon as [earliest available emergency slot]. Will that work for you?

something_else.text: I understand. Could you please provide more details about what you're looking for?

schedule_appointment.text: Great! Let me grab a few things from you to finalize your profile, then I can make you an appointment. Is that okay?

explain_exam_requirement.text: I understand. In Arizona, we are required by law to perform a full exam with x-rays before we can provide a cleaning. This ensures we provide the best care possible. Would you like to proceed with scheduling a full exam and cleaning?

schedule_emergency.text: Alright, let's get you scheduled right away. Can I get some information from you to create your profile?

explain_emergency_options.text: I understand your concern. Even if your insurance doesn't cover it fully, it's important to address dental emergencies quickly. We can still see you for $37, which includes the exam and x-ray. Dr. Shkally can provide antibiotics if needed and help manage your pain. Would you like to reconsider scheduling an appointment?

create_profile.text: Great, let me create your profile. Can you please provide your date of birth, home address, and email address?

confirm_appointment.text: Thank you for that information. Your appointment is set for [appointment time]. I'm going to text you 3 forms to fill out. Please complete them as soon as possible to make your check-in process quick. If you have any trouble with the forms, please let me know. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

offer_followup.text: I understand you want to explore other options. Would it be okay if I give you a call by the end of the day to see if you were able to get everything taken care of?

schedule_followup.text: Great, I'll make a note to call you back. Is there a specific time that works best for you?

additional_questions.text: Of course, I'm here to help. What other questions do you have?

answer_additional_question.text: I hope that answers your question. Is there anything else I can help you with?

end_call.text: Thank you for calling Southern Smiles. We look forward to seeing you soon. Have a great day!
